last_episode_to_air.name: The History of a Marriage
last_episode_to_air.overview: Family and friends arrive in Goa for the decoupling party. Arya encounters a familiar face at the resort. Shruti receives a lucrative offer from Mr. Lee.

name: Decoupled
overview: A misanthropic writer and his startup-founder wife juggle their impending divorce with the absurdities and annoyance of life in their affluent world.

seasons.name: Season 1
seasons.overview: A misanthropic writer and his startup-founder wife juggle their impending divorce with the absurdities and annoyances of life in their affluent world.

episodes.name: Shake His Hand
episodes.overview: Arya and Shruti debate the status of their marriage. Later, Arya’s argumentative impulses land him in trouble at the airport and at a restaurant.

episodes.name: Her Phone Hangs
episodes.overview: Tasked with pitching a streaming series, Arya takes an idea to his CEO-turned-guru friend. Shruti grapples with telling Rohini about her and Arya.

episodes.name: Champion of Maids
episodes.overview: Rohini posts a video to Arya’s Twitter account that gains him new fans. Angry that he won’t take it down, Shruti gets payback at a literature festival.

episodes.name: Peak Ovulation
episodes.overview: Arya attempts to take advantage of a monthly cycle tracking app. Shruti asks him to handle an awkward conversation with her father.

episodes.name: The Ex Returns
episodes.overview: One of Arya’s ex-flames comes to town, but after meeting in person, his excitement to introduce her to Shruti at a party that evening quickly wanes.

episodes.name: Affairs
episodes.overview: As he and Shruti consider seeing other people, Arya suggests a party to announce their divorce. Arya visits Ganesh’s home in hopes of bringing him back.

episodes.name: How to Tell Your Daughter About Divorce
episodes.overview: Arya’s locker room conduct appalls some neighbors. The couple bickers over who will inform Rohini about the divorce. Shruti’s parents visit unexpectedly.

episodes.name: The History of a Marriage
episodes.overview: Family and friends arrive in Goa for the decoupling party. Arya encounters a familiar face at the resort. Shruti receives a lucrative offer from Mr. Lee.

1.name: Season 1
